trans-unit.source: Provides core services of the Microsoft Annotations Framework to manage and display user annotations.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> class for use with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader"></xref> control.
The document reading control associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> class for use with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> control.
The document viewing control associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
viewer is `null`.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> class for use with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref> control.
This constructor can be used with <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived controls:
The document viewing control associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
viewer is `null`.
Represents the command to clear highlight annotations from the current selection.
Represents the command to create a highlight annotation on the current selection.
Represents the command to create an ink-note annotation on the current selection.
Represents the command to create a text-note annotation on the current selection.
Represents the command to delete all ink-note, text-note, and highlight annotations in the current selection.
Represents the command to delete all ink-note and text-note annotations in the current selection.
Disables annotations processing and hides all visible annotations.
When <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Disable%2A> is called all annotations become hidden.

Enables the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> for use with a given <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> and displays all visible annotations.
When <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> is called all annotations in the viewer control window are displayed.
(The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.)
The annotation store to use for reading, writing, and displaying annotations.
annotationStore is `null`.
Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> associated with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls:
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses
The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
The document reader control to return the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> instance for.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> associated with the given document reader control; or `null` if the specified document reader has no <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
reader is `null`.
Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> associated with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls:
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses
The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
The document viewer control to return the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> instance for.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> associated with the given document viewer control; or `null` if the specified viewer control has no <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
viewer is `null`.
Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> instance associated with a specified document viewing control.

The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls:
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses
The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
The document viewing control to return the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> instance for.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> associated with the given document viewing control; or `null` if the specified document viewing control has no <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
viewer is `null`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> is enabled.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> is enabled; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> used by this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> used by the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> is specified as a parameter in the service's <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> used by this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
